Calo Lab
The Calo Lab in the Department of Biology at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology studies the molecular entities controlling and coordinating RNA metabolism, the compendium of all processes that involve RNA, such as synthesis, processing, modifications, export, translation, and degradation, and their role in development and disease.
